Package control

Interface ItineraryDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
ItineraryDAOImpl
public interface ItineraryDAO
Interface for managing the storage and retrieval of itineraries.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addItinerary(Itinerary itinerary)
    Adds an itinerary to the storage.
    void
    deleteItinerary(Date date)
    Deletes the itinerary with the specified date from the storage.
    List<Itinerary>
    getAllItinerary()
    Retrieves all the itineraries stored.
    Itinerary
    getItineraryByDate(Date date)
    Retrieves the itinerary with the specified date from the storage.
    void
    updateItinerary(Itinerary itinerary)
    Updates an existing itinerary with the provided itinerary's information.

  • Method Details

    • addItinerary

      void addItinerary(Itinerary itinerary)
      Adds an itinerary to the storage.
      Parameters:
      itinerary - The itinerary to be added.

    • updateItinerary

      void updateItinerary(Itinerary itinerary)
      Updates an existing itinerary with the provided itinerary's information.
      Parameters:
      itinerary - The updated itinerary.

    • deleteItinerary

      void deleteItinerary(Date date)
      Deletes the itinerary with the specified date from the storage.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the itinerary to be deleted.

    • getAllItinerary

      List<Itinerary> getAllItinerary()
      Retrieves all the itineraries stored.
      Returns:
      A list containing all the itineraries.

    • getItineraryByDate

      Itinerary getItineraryByDate(Date date)
      Retrieves the itinerary with the specified date from the storage.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the itinerary to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The itinerary with the specified date, or null if not found.
